Package civitas.celestis.ui.shape

Interface Shape

All Known Implementing Classes:
Line, Polygon, Triangle
public interface Shape
A two-dimensional area.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IntVector2
    getPoint(int i)
    Returns the ith point of this shape.
    int
    getPointCount()
    Returns the number of points this shape has.
    IntVector2[]
    getPoints()
    Returns an array of points which represent the corners of this shape.
